title: CS601_HW1 Form Authentication
description: A simple HTML/CSS/JS form with validation and a personalized submission summary.

title: CS601_HW2 Drag and Drop
description: An interactive drag-and-drop activity sorting movies and sitcoms using DOM manipulation.

title: CS601_HW3 Portfolio Website
description: A responsive dark-mode one-page portfolio using Flexbox, Grid, and accessibility best practices.

title: CS601_HW4 Country Management System
description: A TypeScript OOP app for managing and filtering countries based on climate/environmental data.

title: CS601_HW5 Game Inventory
description: A React-based game inventory app showing a list of games and individual detail pages.
